attributes.action: Remove VED (road tax) from all motorcycles.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When space on roads is at a premium, motorcycles make no contribution to congestion. They also do very little damage to the surfaces. Removal of this tax would help bring motorcycles into the mainstream and not just a leisure activity then making roads less congested for those that need the independance public transport cannot provide. the m.o.t certificate could replace the VED disc to allow checking.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
